comment: There is no shift. Lying pollsters just have a whole lot less to lie about. The Trump Train has been picking up speed since Trump stopped Obama from weaseling in the TPP during the lame duck session - before even being sworn into office! My guess: biggest mid-term thumbs-up from voters since FDR!
